topComments.author: jacob shalev
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) M√£os para baixo a melhor experi√™ncia que tive. Levei meus 3 filhos (4,6 e 9 anos) pela primeira vez. Reservamos uma cabana privada com anteced√™ncia. Para a faixa et√°ria dos meus filhos, isso foi mais do que suficiente. Os escorregas, as piscinas e o rio lento... Desde o f√°cil acesso, a limpeza das instala√ß√µes, funcion√°rios simp√°ticos, o profissionalismo dos salva-vidas observando cada um como um falc√£o, voc√™ pode se sentir √† vontade e aproveitar seu dia sem estresse. Eu absolutamente amo este lugar e eu definitivamente recomendo para quem √© local da costa do tesouro e quer evitar a loucura de Orlando.  (Original) Hands down the best experience I had. Took my 3 kids (4,6 and a 9 years old) for the first time. We reserved a private cabana ahead of time. For my kids age group that was more than enough. The slides,pools and lazy river... From the easy access,the cleanliness of the facility, friendly staff, the professionalism of the life guards watching every one like a hawk you could feel at ease and enjoy your day stress free. I absolutely love this place and I would definitely recommend it to anyone who's local to the treasure coast and wants to avoid the Orlando madness.

topComments.author: Yasmin A
topComments.comment: We had a birthday party in one of the party rooms today & our party attendant was Kailey. She made sure everything we needed was taken care of in a timely manner & she was so polite. She is a hard worker for sure because she was running between 2 party rooms & didn't flinch when it came to our requests. The park was a blast, we will definitely be doing it again! Thank you Kailey for all your help, God bless üôå

topComments.author: Sharon Haworth
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Meus 3 netos se divertiram muito. 11, 5 e 3 anos. Salva-vidas estavam em todos os lugares e muito atentos √† seguran√ßa de todos os nadadores. topComments.author: - Hotch
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Sempre um lugar incr√≠vel para fazer uma festa de anivers√°rio. Haven completou 10 anos, um grande marco. Tivemos 1 de 11 convites e mais para a fam√≠lia. 1 crian√ßa em sua classe apareceu, nenhum dos pais nos contatou com um sim ou n√£o. Desolador, e a primeira vez que isso aconteceu. Quando eu era crian√ßa, um convite como esse era lembrado diariamente at√© a festa. Tirando isso, ela ainda se divertiu muito, e a 1 amiga que apareceu da aula dela deu a ela o presente mais fofo. Haven nem percebeu, ela se divertiu muito com um casal de amigos, o dia inteiro. Tivemos alguns amigos de apoio que vieram tamb√©m. Ela √© a mais doce, anjinho. Feliz Anivers√°rio Porto.  (Original) Always an amazing place to have a birthday party. Haven turned 10, a huge milestone. We had 1 out 11 invites plus more for family. 1 kid in her class showed up, not one parent contacted us with a yes or no.Heartbreaking, and first time this happened. When I was a kid, an invite like this was reminded daily till the party. All of that aside she still had a blast , and the 1 friend who showed up from her class  gave her the sweetest gift. Haven didn't even notice, she had a wonderful time with a couple of friends , the whole day. We had some back up pals that came as well. She the sweetest , little angel. Happy Birthday Haven.

Muitos salva-vidas de plant√£o e com o plano de prote√ß√£o pudemos voltar ao parque depois que a tempestade passou, 20 min de espera, foi incr√≠vel!  (Original) My family had a blast here! topComments.author: Teylar Arroyo

topComments.author: Caleb Price
topComments.comment: I really love this park, my 1 year old and 5 year old niece had a ton of fun. My only 2 complaints are that they charge for kids that aren‚Äôt old enough to even play on anything. It‚Äôs 16 dollars for kids 1-12 years old. So 16 dollars for my 1 year old  to sit in the water and splash. It‚Äôd be cool if they had  something where kids under 2 are free. And my last one is you can‚Äôt use the diving boards.

topComments.author: Tara Biek
topComments.comment: Great park for the whole family!! My daughter is on the county swim team so we are always on the lap pool side. But their rec side is great too! They have water slides and a fun zone for the kiddos. My mom friends and I enoy the lazy river! You can get a summer pass on the counties website too to save money.

A comida estava boa, comemos a pizza (queijo e calabresa). O gerente o mais doce que ele realmente fez com que tudo estivesse perfeito e se alguma coisa estava fora do lugar ele cuidava imediatamente! topComments.author: Jerry Vasco
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo local para deixar as crian√ßas se divertirem. A maioria dos funcion√°rios foi √≥tima e prestativa ao fazer perguntas, mas alguns funcion√°rios n√£o entendem o significado do servi√ßo ao cliente. Se voc√™ n√£o souber a resposta, n√£o diga "N√£o posso ajud√°-lo, n√£o sei essa resposta". Aconteceu ao pedir comida duas vezes. Tive que dizer a ambos para pedirem uma resposta a algu√©m. Tamb√©m em tobo√°guas grandes, √© necess√°rio um sinal no piso inferior explicando que existem 2 linhas individuais, dependendo do slide em que voc√™ vai. Ter um sinal aliviaria aquela facilidade real, em vez de grades desgastadas.  No geral, embora as meninas de crian√ßas pequenas tivessem uma explos√£o e voltariam. √â altamente recomend√°vel comprar prote√ß√£o contra intemp√©ries, especialmente no ver√£o. Valeu a pena os poucos d√≥lares extras durante o ver√£o!  (Original) Great spot to let kids have fun.  Most staff was great and helpful when asking questions, but some staff don't understand the meaning of customer service.  If you don't know the answer, don't say "I can't help you, I don't know that answer." Happened when ordering food twice. I had to tell both to go ask someone for an answer.  Also on big water slides need a sign on bottom floor explaining there are 2 individual lines depending on which slide you go on. Having sign would alleviate that real easy instead of worn out railings.  Overall though toddlers girls had a blast and would go back. Highly recommend buying weather protection also especially in summer time. Worth the extra few bucks during summer time!

topComments.author: Kristin Anderson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Trouxemos nosso filho pequeno aqui e tivemos um tempo maravilhoso! Conseguimos um lugar sob um pavilh√£o perto dos grandes tobo√°guas e passamos o dia l√°. A √°rea de splash foi perfeita para crian√ßas menores e at√© mesmo nosso beb√™ teve um grande momento. Os slides para adultos nunca ficavam lotados e eram muito divertidos tamb√©m. O rio lento era relaxante e definitivamente uma parte bem-vinda do parque. Existem muitas √°reas de mergulho ao redor, mas esta √© a √∫nica com um rio lento. H√° um posto de alimenta√ß√£o e a comida √© boa e com pre√ßos razo√°veis. Meu marido e eu dividimos uma refei√ß√£o de 6 pe√ßas com batatas fritas e um refrigerante por US $ 10,00. Os salva-vidas est√£o muito vigilantes e o local foi constantemente higienizado. O pre√ßo de $ 15,00 por pessoa foi definitivamente justificado. Sem d√∫vida vamos recomendar este lugar e voltar n√≥s mesmos!  (Original) We brought our infant son here and had a wonderful time! We were able to get a spot under a pavilion near the large water slides and spend the day there. The splash area was perfect for smaller kids and even our infant had a great time. The adult slides were never crowded and were tons of fun too. The lazy river was relaxing and definitely a welcomed part of the park. There are lots of splash areas around, but this is the only one with a lazy river. There is a food station and the food is good and reasonable priced. My husband and I shared a 6-piece tenders meal with fries and a soda for $10.00. The lifeguards are very vigilant and the place was constantly being sanitized. The price of $15.00 per person was definitely justified. We will definitely recommend this place and be coming back ourselves!

topComments.author: Sean Dawkins
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amei. Meus filhos se divertiram muito. O parque fez o poss√≠vel para suprir a falta de estoque na cozinha. Tive que esperar por um caminh√£o de reabastecimento √†s 14h. Tudo deu certo e ningu√©m percebeu o problema. Excelente trabalho da parte do funcion√°rio para administrar a situa√ß√£o. Eu vou voltar definitivamente.  (Original) Loved it. My kids had so much fun. The park did their best to mange the shortage of inventory in the kitchen. Had to wait for a resupply truck at 2pm. Everything worked out for the best a d no one even noticed the issue. Great job on the employee's part to mange the situation. I will definitely go back.

topComments.author: Keith Campbell

Passamos 4 horas aqui e o tempo voou !! N√≥s vamos voltar !!  (Original) I have a 10-year-old 5-year-old and 17 month old and it is friendly for all of the ages !!
